text: Ilayaval Gayathri is an Indian Malayalam television series launched on Mazhavil Manorama channel on 24 September 2018. Arya Parvathy and Varada Jishin are the main female leads of the show. ==Plot== Gayathri, a young girl, who works as a postwoman and struggles to support her family while overcoming various obstacles that she comes across in her life. ==Cast== ;Lead Cast *Arya Parvathy as Gayathri * Varada Jishin as Gauri * Sajan Surya as Manu * Harikrishnan / Pratheesh as Nandan *Devasurya as Shwetha Menon *Jishin Joseph as Rajesh *Kottayam Rasheed as Cornel uncle ; Supporting Cast * Vijayalakshmi as Madhavi * Gayathri Lakshmi as Subhashini * Manka Mahesh *Manu Varma *Sreedevi Anil *Sindhu *Ambika Mohan *Kavitha Lakshmi *Surjith *Rajesh Marath Asalan *Gomathi Mahadevan *Aniyappan == References == == External links == * Category:Indian television soap operas Category:Serial drama television series Category:2018 Indian television series debuts Category:Malayalam-language television shows Category:Indian drama television series
title: Ilayaval Gayathri
